revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=RP-N53 |revision=(A1) |upc=886227446490 |asin=B00EPGKS4S |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Edimax |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |fcc_date=06/27/2013 |fcc_id=MSQ-RPN53 |ic_id=3568A-RPN53 |pcb_id=1244-01000902-50Z |type=access point, range extender, audio streamer |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.25 |pwr_conn=NEMA 1-15P |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7620A |cpu1_cspeed=580 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9751G6KB-25 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7620A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi2_chip1_model=RT5592 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags=Audio out (3.5mm) |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid=ASUS_RPN53, ASUS_RPN53_5G |default_ssid_regex=^ASUS_RPN53$,,, ^ASUS_RPN53_5G$ |default_ip= |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Dual-Band Wireless-N600 Range Extender/Access Point}} :[http://www.asus.com/Networking/RPN53/ Product page]
"1244-01000902-50Z" is silkscreened on the main board in the FCC photos. :Default settings (including the SSIDs) are per the FCC sample label and manual.
* Dual-band concurrent range extender * Full coverage with internal MIMO antennas * One-press setup and worry-free connectivity * Streaming music with ASUS AiPlayer app or AirPlay
This device supports audio streaming.. :this function is controllable with the ''ASUS AiPlayer'' app ([https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dlna.asus2 on Android]).
{{OpenWrtTechData|https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/asus/asus_rp-n53}} {{•}} {{OpenWrtWiki|https://openwrt.org/toh/asus/rp-n53}}
===Specifications=== *Product Segment: 802.11abgn N600 :300Mbps (2.4GHz) + 300Mbps (5GHz) *Antenna: 2x internal PCB antenna *Ports: 1x RJ45 for 10/100 BaseT for WAN *Power Supply: AC Input : 110~240V (50/60Hz) :DC Output : 5V with max 1.2A current *Dimensions: 45 x 31 x 85 mm (WxDxH) *Weight: 90 g
===Forum threads=== *[http://forums.hardwarezone.com.sg/internet-bandwidth-networking-clinic-4/%5Bmaylyns-review-~-networking%5D-asus-rp-n53-4290051.html ''Maylyn's Review'' on '''HardwareZone''' forums] *[http://forums.smallnetbuilder.com/showthread.php?t=11810 ''ASUS RP-N53'' on '''SNB''' forums]
===Misc=== *[http://www.likelyanswers.com/6778055/Mediatek-First-To-Bring-80211ac-1t1r-dual-Band-Concurrent-Home-Networks MediaTek press release]
===See also=== : [http://www.asus.com/event/2014/network/ASUS_AC_family_chart/solutions.html Asus Wireless AC networking solutions] <!-- * [http://www.asus.com/us/site/routers/DD-WRT/ Asus Routers with DD-WRT firmware support] * [http://event.asus.com/2013/nw/ASUSWRT/index.htm AsusWRT Support List] * [http://www.hub.ru/wiki/Devices_ASUS_WL_Routers Devices ASUS Routers] -->
:;Wireless Range Extender * [[ASUS RP-AC68U]] AC1900 (450+1733Mbps) • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RPAC68U/ Product page] * [[ASUS RP-AC56]] AC1200 (300+867Mbps) • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RPAC56/ Product page] * [[ASUS RP-AC52]] AC750 (300+433Mbps) • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RPAC52/ Product page] * [[ASUS RP-N53]] N600 (600Mbps) • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RPN53/ Product page] • [https://openwrt.org/_media/media/asus/rp-n53_serial.jpeg PCB] * [[ASUS RP-N14]] N300 (300Mbps) • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RPN14/ Product page]
